section.title: Creating an Infrastructure Report
section.para: Create a quick report of infrastructure items in CSV, TXT, or PDF formats.

procedure.title: To Create an Infrastructure Item Report

step.para: Hover over Infrastructure or Clouds and click the page of the item for report generation.
Click the Download button for the type of report.
